headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  COOPER, HENRY S.F.

snippet: COOPER--Henry S.F.,Jr. The Board of Trustees and staff of The New York Society Library mourn the loss of Henry S.F. Cooper Jr. A Library member since he could read, Henry joined the Board in 1971. He served as chair 1985-1992 and last year was elected Trustee Emeritus. Henry evinced a love for the traditions of the Library. In celebration of our 250th anniversary, he co-wrote a splendid history of the Library. Godspeed to you, Henry. We have been fortunate to know you as colleague and friend. 1/3
lead_paragraph: COOPER--Henry S.F.,Jr. The Board of Trustees and staff of The New York Society Library mourn the loss of Henry S.F. Cooper Jr. A Library member since he could read, Henry joined the Board in 1971. He served as chair 1985-1992 and last year was elected Trustee Emeritus. Henry evinced a love for the traditions of the Library. In celebration of our 250th anniversary, he co-wrote a splendid history of the Library. Godspeed to you, Henry. We have been fortunate to know you as colleague and friend. 1/3
